scripts.Setup: install composer dependencies: docker exec -it 4s-deploy-service-app sh -c "cd ci4 && composer install && cd ../zmq && composer install"
scripts.Setup: install npm dependencies: docker exec -it 4s-deploy-service-app sh -c "cd vue && npm install"
scripts.Setup: migrate: docker exec -it 4s-deploy-service-app sh -c "cd ci4 && php spark migrate"
scripts.Tools: rerun last migration: docker exec -it 4s-deploy-service-app sh -c "cd ci4 && php spark app:migrate"
